I am off to work late shift as of 5pm Sat. 2-2-08.
I will respond to emails Sun. afternoon.

Thanks, Scott

Posted By: S Gross
Hello all !!!!!!!!

Well after a late night at work, and a later night listening to Linsey Holler opening for Joey Alcorn, I am up and ready to respond.

I have 33 emails (including Joanne's "junk" email [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]) to go thru.  So that might take an hour or two, a few cups of coffe and a smoke break.  It's also 75 degrees in Savannah, so I might have to take a nice walk.  But I have to be at work by 5, so I'll be done by then.

Thanks for all your interest, Scott
